About Me

Hi, my name is Kyle and I’m a Computer Science student at Elon University. I’m extremely interested in the creative potential of programming in both games and applications. I’m proficient in GameMaker Studio 2, mySQL, and a number of Object Oriented Programming languages. I am a Le Wagon Alumni (Batch #269), and plan to graduate from Elon University in 2023.

Hi, my name is Kyle and I’m a Computer Science student at Elon University and a Le Wagon Alumni (Batch #269). I plan to graduate from Elon in 2023. I’m proficient in GameMaker Studio 2, mySQL, and a number of Object Oriented Programming languages. I have worked as a freelance tutor and a swim coach. I am working on several projects: a personal website, a SmartHome web app that can enable control from different voice assistants, and a RPG built in GameMaker Studio 2.
